summary: Completed comprehensive testing of EcoTrails hiking companion app after guest access fixes. Backend APIs working well, frontend explore page functional, but place details and journal pages have routing issues for guest users.

minor_bugs.issue: Root health check returns HTML instead of JSON
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - doesn't affect app functionality, this is expected behavior for frontend redirect

configuration_issues.impact: Geocoding features unavailable but core functionality works
configuration_issues.solution: Enable Geocoding API in Google Cloud Console

integration_issues.issue: Navigating to /places/ChIJVVVVVVXlUVMRu-GPNDD5qKw redirects to /explore for guest users
Navigating to /journal redirects to /explore for guest users

passed_tests: Backend API health check (6/8 endpoints working - same as iteration 1)
Places search API - GET /api/v1/places/search?query=yellowstone - returns Yellowstone National Park
Place details API - GET /api/v1/places/ChIJVVVVVVXlUVMRu-GPNDD5qKw - returns full place details with 8 trails
Trails API - GET /api/v1/places/ChIJVVVVVVXlUVMRu-GPNDD5qKw/trails - returns 8 trails including Grand Prismatic Spring Overlook Trail
Weather API - GET /api/v1/places/ChIJVVVVVVXlUVMRu-GPNDD5qKw/weather - returns current weather (36.52Â°F)
Magic link authentication flow working correctly
AI Companion insight generation working with test observations
Nearby places search working (44 places found near Yellowstone)
Frontend explore page guest access working with localStorage setup
Frontend explore page displays 'Explorer' greeting for guest users correctly
Frontend search input functional and accepts user input
Frontend UI layout and responsive design working correctly
Quick explore categories (National Parks, Waterfall hikes, etc.) displaying correctly

success_percentage.frontend: 70% (explore page working, but place details and journal pages have routing issues)
success_percentage.integration: 80% (core functionality working, minor routing issues for guest users)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend routing issues: 1) Place details page (/places/ChIJVVVVVVXlUVMRu-GPNDD5qKw) should be accessible to guest users but currently redirects to /explore, 2) Journal page accessibility needs clarification - should guest users have access or should it show a proper login prompt instead of redirecting? 3) Same backend issues remain: Enable Google Maps Geocoding API in Google Cloud Console.
